moves.name: Fairy Lock
moves.description: By locking down the battlefield, the user keeps all Pokémon from fleeing during the next turn.

moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Fairy Wind
moves.description: The user stirs up a fairy wind and strikes the target with it.

moves.name: Astonish
moves.description: The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Metal Sound
moves.description: A horrible sound like scraping metal harshly reduces the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Spikes
moves.description: The user lays a trap of spikes at the opposing team's feet. The trap hurts Pokémon that switch into battle.

moves.name: Draining Kiss
moves.description: The user steals the target's energy with a kiss. The user's HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Crafty Shield
moves.description: The user protects itself and its allies from status moves with a mysterious power. This does not stop moves that do damage.

moves.name: Foul Play
moves.description: The user turns the target's power against it. The higher the target's Attack stat, the greater the damage.

moves.name: Torment
moves.description: The user torments and enrages the target, making it incapable of using the same move twice in a row.

moves.name: Mirror Shot
moves.description: The user looses a flash of energy at the target from its polished body. It may also lower the target's accuracy.

moves.name: Imprison
moves.description: If the opponents know any move also known by the user, the opponents are prevented from using it.

moves.name: Recycle
moves.description: The user recycles a held item that has been used in battle so it can be used again.

moves.name: Play Rough
moves.description: The user plays rough with the target and attacks it. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.

moves.name: Magic Room
moves.description: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon's held items lose their effects for five turns.

moves.name: Heal Block
moves.description: For five turns, the user prevents the opposing team from using any moves, Abilities, or held items that recover HP.
